A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I did write an entire review but ended up losing it due to RT's awesome interface. Instead of re-writing\, there are plenty of other 1/2 star reviews where everyone is voicing the same problems with the movie that I had. In short\, the movie sucked. Regardless of wanting to try something new or not\, they flopped hard. Will not be seeing another Star Wars movie produced by Disney in theaters ever again\, unless they decide to let the First Order wipe out every single resistance member and take over the galaxy. That would be the only saving grace for this dumpster fire of a trilogy.
